channel.title: CSS resources
channel.description:
Heres some CSS resources I figured I would post.
http://www.w3schools.com/default.asp http://www.w3.org/Style/CSS/ http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-CSS2/ http://www.csszengarden.com/ http://jigsaw.w3.org/css-validator/ http://resources.bravenet.com/articles/site_building/CSS/ http://css.maxdesign.com.au/ http://www.alistapart.com/topics/css/ http://www.positioniseverything.net/ http://www.glish.com/css/ http://www.websitetips.com/css/index.shtml http://www.456bereastreet.com/ http://www.evolt.org http://www.westciv.com/ http://ronsguide.com/index.php?page=tutorials&cat=css http://www.stunicholls.myby.co.uk/ http://wellstyled.com/index.html http://bluerobot.com/ http://msdn.microsoft.com/workshop/author/dhtml/overview/ccomment_ovw.asp http://www.xs4all.nl/~peterned/ http://www.quirksmode.org/css/condcom.html http://www.somacon.com/p142.php http://blog.html.it/layoutgala/ http://www.brunildo.org/test
CSS Positioning - good, simple guide http://www.brainjar.com/css/positioning/default.asp
Browser Stats - so you know which browser you need to hack and code for. http://www.w3schools.com/browsers/browsers_stats.asp
recommended CSS software http://www.bradsoft.com/topstyle
http://jigsaw.w3.org/css-validator/ CSS Validator
http://www.meyerweb.com/eric/css/edge/ CSS Guru
http://www.websitetips.com/css/index.shtml Articles, Tutorials and Links
http://www.cssplay.co.uk << Just a pretty damn cool site :) this dude made games and shit :eek:
[URL=http://www.picment.com/articles/css/funwithforms/]Get some style on your forms[/URL]
[URL=http://www.mezzoblue.com/archives/2004/02/25/sidestepping/]Sidestepping IE[/URL]
[URL=http://www.hotdesign.com/seybold/index.html]Don't be stupid, don't use tables!![/URL]
Enjoy :)

item.title: CSS resources
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote=“93dcthugs93, post:3, topic:47979”]Yeah tables suck ass!

But, these links are really helpful. If your new to CSS you shouldn’t definitely read up on these links.[/quote]

You mean should?

sicarius99:

w3schools is by far the best resource

W3schools is the most interactive though it is by no means the best.

Read full topic
